alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Emmet; Humboldt; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 5:31PM CDT until July 05 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Emmet County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Webster County in central Iowa... Pocahontas County in northwestern Iowa... Northern Sac County in west central Iowa... Western Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Northwestern Calhoun County in west central Iowa... Western Humboldt County in north central Iowa... Palo Alto County in northwestern Iowa... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spencer In Clay County to near Sioux Rapids to Storm Lake to near Galva, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Estherville, Emmetsburg, Sac City, Pocahontas, Rockwell City, Manson, Laurens, Swan Lake, Five Island Lake, Ingham Lake, Iowa Lake, North Twin Lake, High Lake, Lost Island Lake, South Twin Lake, Okamanpedan Lake, Silver Lake, Rush Lake, Armstrong and Graettinger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Emmet; Humboldt; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Pocahontas; Sac; Webster
